/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, their red and white facades standing out against the blue sky. These buildings are adorned with ornate roofs and signs, adding to the cultural richness of the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
